name: Consorzio Italiano Compostatori
goal: To promote the development of source separated collection of organic waste, for use in the production of compost and biomathane. To promote the use of high quality compost and digestate on field crops, nurseries, vegetable crops, landscaping and other uses. To promote the use of compostable packaging materials destined to composting and AD plants.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: End of waste, packaging directive, animal by product regulation, fertilizer regulation; organic farming regulations, circular economy package
